GrapeMeeting: You're in the mood for a drink and a snack.
The bar near your house would be perfect for such an occassion.
Amidst the sounds of people talking to each other, you can clearly make out a conversation between a woman at the bar and the bartender.
"...no no, you have to expand your mind a little. Stealing is EXTREMELY ethical..."
I know this guy here gets it!
You work all day and make no money and then big stores have the GALL to charge you prices that no one can pay, right?
I knew you would get it!
Here, I'll explain it to you.
You spend some time talking with Grape about class struggle.
I think you've got a lot to learn...
But you got a good heart.
I like where you're coming from.
Tell you what, hit me up sometime and we'll hang out and I can show you how it really is out here!
It looks like you'll be expanding your class conciousness soon...
GrapephoneCallpickUp1: hey im not doing anything if you wanna get together later
GrapephoneCallpickUp2: Hey! I was just about to call you, haha. No joke!
I was gonna see if you were up to anything.
Thought you might wanna hang out or something. I'm pretty much down for anything.
GrapephoneCallpickUp3: what are u in the mood for
GrapephoneCallpickUpBurgers: Ah, the food of the working class! I could absolutely demolish some burgers right now.
It's a date! I'll start walking over there now.
GrapephoneCallpickUpBar: Ah, now you're talking. I wonder if they still have those pickle chips there...
...but uh... you gotta get me a cab if I end up going a little too hard, ok?
GrapephoneCallpickUpPark: Ah, the public park. The last bastion of communal property ownership.
Yeah, I'm down to hit the park. That's by your place, right? I'll start walking now!
GrapephoneCallpickUpVenue: I dunno who's playing tonight, but there's always someone good there.
You wanna run by my place and we'll take the train over there?
GrapephoneCallpickUpWrestling: Hey, as long as you don't mind that I don't know the first thing about wrestling, I'm definitely down to go.
I hope that means you're paying for tickets though, cuz buddy, I'm broke.
GrapephoneCallpickUpRestaurant: An upscale restaurant, huh? Not exactly my kind of atmosphere...
...but hey! It might be nice to eat something other than spaghettios and GumchBurger for once, eh?
GrapephoneCallpickUpHome: You wanna come to my house?
It's not exactly clean right now...
Alright, let me clear off a surface for you to sit on before you come over.
Ok, see you when you get here.
GrapephoneCallpickUpMall: Ah, the mall... a monument to capitalist consumption...
I do need some new jeans though.
Ok, you convinced me. I'll see you over there. Meet you out front.
GrapeBurgers1: You meet Grape at the GumchBurger
Ya know, one of my favorite things about coming here is taking home like 50 ketchup packets.
Ok... so... do me a favor real quick and stand in front of me while I shove a ton of these into my pockets...
Hahaha, I knew you were alright. Ok, POSITIONS!
Grape fills her pockets with ketchup packets.
Aw, c'mon you big baby. It's not like they do have 10 bazillion of these.
Take a stand against the machine once in a while, eh?
Grape stuffs her pockets full of ketchup packets while looking around nervously.
GrapeBurgers2: You meet Grape at the GumchBurger
I know the burger is the "Thing To Get" here...
...but what else do you like to get?
One must wonder if you REALLY enjoy the craptastic grease mound that is Gumchburger... or if you long for something more fancy... hmm....
That's the true choice of the people! No human great or small can resist the beautiful simplicity of the ground meat nuggie.
That's the kind of good taste I've come to expect from you.
Ah, who amongst us does not enjoy a good Ice Cream treat from time to time.
I respect that. Just don't eat too many!!!
You spend time talking to Grape about the menu choices.
GrapeBurgers3: You went to get some burgers with Grape.
I bet I could rob this Gumchburger pretty easily.
How about we put on our ski masks and make some quick cash?
We would do such a good job too.
I knew you'd be on board.
I wasn't actually gonna do it.
You and Grape discuss committing crimes.
GrapeBar1: You meet Grape at the subway station and ride there together.
Grape is going on a tipsy rant about orgazational structures in large corporations.
...and THAT's why no one can find a job AND companies can't find employees, you know what I mean?
I mean... who do YOU think a company relies on the most?
You haven't listened to anything I've said, have you? Hahaha!
RIGHT. The pressure AND the risk is all on the people who make the least amount of money ugh...
GrapeVenue1: You and Grape go see a show.
OH, I had no idea that Police-Dissection was opening tonight!
A lot of people say they kick ass now, but their first album is just not as good.
Is their first album kinda basic?
Yeah, that's kinda the consensus, I think.
I mean... I don't care what anyone says, though.
I still think its worth a listen.
People just fail to see its depth!
I think it's definitely due for a cultural re-evaluation.
If you haven't heard it yet, that means you get to have the enviable experience of hearing it for the first time!
Check it out on MusicStreamer and text me to let me know what you think!
You and Grape talk about Police-Dissection's catalogue of albums.
GrapeSpecialEvent1: %NARRATION%
Grape takes you to a show.
She seems really excited to see this band and see what you think abou them.
%LOCATIONGIRL%
%DATETEXT%
Dude, you are gonna love this group, Primordial Dudes.
They've really got it all: Riffs, Shreds and good politics, baby.
%NARRATION%
The band, Primordial Dudes, starts playing.
They're a classic punk band... you can see why Grape likes them so much.
Interestingly, besides a drummer, guitarist, singer and bass player...
They also have a bassoon player.
The combination of socially concious hardcore punk and bassoon works together surprisingly well.
Seamlessly, even.
%DATETEXT%
OK buddy, I hope you've been enjoying standing over here on the side...
cuz its ass kicking time!
%NARRATION%
Grape shoves you into the middle of the crowd.
She joins you and starts pushing and shoving other moshers.
%DATETEXT%
HAHA YEAAAH!
%NARRATION%
After spending a night smashing into strangers and Grape alike... you feel like you know her a little better.
%DATETEXT%
Whew!
Hey...
I appreciate you coming out tonight.
I've been having a good time hanging out with you.
Next time YOU pick an artist and we'll go see them together, haha.
%NARRATION%
As you and Grape leave, you see the band packing up.
The bassoon player sees you looking at them and waves hi.
Before she can talk to you though, a fan runs up to her and starts talking to her.
Perhaps you can talk to her later...
%DONE%
